description: This file is a minified JavaScript library, specifically vis.js, a dynamic browser-based visualization library. It defines an immediately invoked function expression (IIFE) that exports the library using various module systems. It includes numerous utility functions, classes, and methods related to visualization, date/time handling, and other functionalities of vis.js.

classes.name: Lt
classes.description: Primary class representing vis.js core object, including methods for data management, visualization, and configuration.

classes.name: g
classes.description: A moment.js related class for date/time handling within vis.js context.

classes.name: RangeHelper
classes.description: Utility class for range calculations, bounding boxes, and coordinate conversions within the visualization.

classes.name: Cluster
classes.description: Class responsible for clustering nodes and edges based on various strategies such as hub size, connection, or edge count.

classes.name: CanvasDrawer
classes.description: Handles rendering of nodes and edges onto HTML Canvas, including resizing, redrawing, and drawing utilities.

classes.name: InteractionHandler
classes.description: Manages user interactions such as dragging, zooming, touch gestures, and event binding with Hammer.js.

classes.name: LayoutEngine
classes.description: Calculates positions for nodes using different layout algorithms and manages layout stabilization and animations.

classes.name: PhysicsEngine
classes.description: Implements physics simulations for node positioning, including force calculations, stabilization, and force-directed layout.

methods.name: Network
methods.description: Constructor for creating network visualization instances.

methods.name: DataSet
methods.description: Class for handling datasets within vis.js.

methods.name: getRange
methods.description: Calculates the bounding box range for a set of nodes or objects.

methods.name: findCenter
methods.description: Finds the center point of a given range or group of nodes.

methods.name: setOptions
methods.description: Sets configuration options for the visualization or specific modules.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the visualization environment, including canvas, event handlers, and rendering contexts.

methods.name: draw
methods.description: Redraws the entire visualization including nodes and edges.

methods.name: resize
methods.description: Adjusts the size of the canvas and coordinate systems based on container size.

methods.name: updateNode
methods.description: Updates properties of a specific node.

methods.name: updateEdge
methods.description: Updates properties of a specific edge.

methods.name: clusterNodes
methods.description: Creates node clusters based on connection strength or other criteria.

methods.name: applyLayout
methods.description: Computes positions for nodes based on the selected layout algorithm.

methods.name: startPhysics
methods.description: Begins the physics simulation for force-directed layouts.
